name: Hotel Indigo Dresden - Wettiner Platz
description: Experience the Hotel Indigo® Dresden – Wettiner Platz, located conveniently between the contemporary cultural centre Kraftwerk Mitte and Dresden’s historical centre. All world-renowned attractions, like the Zwinger, the Church of Our Lady and the Semperoper, can be reached within walking distance. Enjoy our 132 stylish air-conditioned rooms, high speed Wi-Fi throughout the entire hotel, buffet and à la carte breakfast, a well-equipped fitness centre, local and cosmopolitan drinks and 24-hour snacks. “Dresden Mitte” S-Bahn and tram station is only a few minutes’ walk away, so that Dresden Central Station, the International Congress Centre and Dresden Fair Grounds can be reached within 10 minutes. A taxi ride to Dresden International Airport (DRS) takes only 15 minutes.IHG Hotels & Resorts
